name: Ptree Error
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

In this game, You have 6 chances to not turn off your computer.

When it gets to 0 chances, you will get punishments. There are 8 punishments.

But, The extra chance is a Math Quiz.

Wrong Answers: 21, 30, 45

Correct Answer: 19

If you get the wrong answer, you will continue with the punishments until your computer crash.

If you get the correct answer, you will get your computer back.

And then the game will close.

(Only when you got the correct answer, or when you got the Red Screen Of Death.)

Credit goes to Ptree for helping me make this Error Game.

Credit goes to RecordGuy626 for me borrowing the picture of Yimen.

Game Made By: Kingprui40 Dash
